meanings.definition: Appears as a vague form, especially in a large or threatening way.
meanings.sent1: The dark, looming clouds signaled an approaching storm.
meanings.sent2: The mountain cast a looming shadow over the valley.
meanings.sent3: The looming figure in the fog turned out to be a friendly scarecrow.
meanings.sent4: The looming deadline made everyone work faster.
meanings.sent5: The looming presence of the haunted house sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: Hangs over in a threatening or large way.
meanings.sent1: The looming branches of the old tree made it look spooky at night.
meanings.sent2: The dark clouds loomed ominously over the city.
meanings.sent3: The looming shadow on the wall turned out to be just a coat hanging there.
meanings.sent4: The looming threat of a storm forced everyone to seek shelter.
meanings.sent5: The looming mountain in the distance seemed to touch the sky.
